text: The Los Angeles Film Critics Association Award for Best Animated Feature is one of the annual awards given by the Los Angeles Film Critics Association. This award had been given since 1989 and between 2001 and present it helps with the nominations for the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature. ==Winners== ===1980s=== {| class="wikitable"
